summary: Email correspondence between court officials Daniel Ortiz and Jim Molinelli regarding a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith in the Southern District of New York. The email includes an attachment of the warrant and mentions a forthcoming charging document.

persons.name: Daniel Ortiz
persons.role: Director of Criminal Case Operations, United States District Court Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of an email from Jim Molinelli regarding a sealed warrant and charging document.

persons.name: Jim Molinelli
persons.role: Court official (likely prosecutor or court staff)
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting a copy of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith and indicating a charging document will follow.

persons.name: Judge Smith
persons.context: Judge who signed the sealed warrant referenced in the email correspondence.

connections.description: Court colleagues communicating about official court documents (sealed warrant and charging document).
Molinelli references a warrant recently signed by Judge Smith.

events.title: Transmission of Sealed Warrant
events.description: Jim Molinelli emails Daniel Ortiz a copy of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith, with a promise to transmit a numbered charging document shortly.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York, 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY
keyFacts: A sealed warrant was signed by Judge Smith in the Southern District of New York.
The warrant and a forthcoming charging document were being transmitted between court officials via email on June 29, 2020.
The document is part of official court operations, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
